hero.title: Connect Your Community with CivicConnect
hero.subtitle: Report grievances, track civic issues, and engage with your local government—all in one place.

features.heading: What You Can Do
features.subheading: CivicConnect brings citizens and local administration together for faster resolution and transparency.
features.reportDesc: Submit issues with photos and location. AI helps categorize and prioritize.
features.mapDesc: View nearby amenities, utilities, and report issues on the map.
features.eventsDesc: Discover local events and register as a volunteer.
features.secureDesc: Your data is protected. Track status and get updates.

benefits.one: Report civic issues with photos and location
benefits.two: Track grievance status in real time
benefits.three: Access city map and public utilities
benefits.four: Get notified when your issue is resolved

cta.heading: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of citizens using CivicConnect to improve their neighborhoods.

hero.title: About CivicConnect
hero.subtitle: Bridging the gap between citizens and local government for a better city.

story.title: Our Story
story.para1: CivicConnect was built to make civic engagement simple and effective. We believe every citizen should have a direct channel to report issues, track resolutions, and participate in local governance.
story.para2: From grievance reporting to public utility maps and community events, we bring transparency and accountability to urban civic life.

values.heading: Our Values
values.subheading: We are guided by principles that put citizens and communities first.
values.missionDesc: Every feature is designed to make reporting and tracking easy for citizens.
values.trustDesc: Open status updates and clear communication with the administration.
values.inclusiveDesc: Multilingual support so everyone can participate in their language.
values.excellenceDesc: We strive for fast resolution and reliable service.

cta.title: Together for a Better City
cta.subtitle: Join the CivicConnect community and help shape your neighborhood.
